long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The API-driven CMS

Contentful is a flexible and future-friendly content management platform that lets you easily publish content across platforms. Create content once and publish it everywhere! 

Existing CMS have a legacy, page-centric view of the web. We created a new content management platform: cloud-based, API-driven with structured content and a focus on your custom presentation layers.

With Contentful, editors manage content interactively in an easy-to-use editing interface, while developers deliver the content with the programming language and template framework of their choice.

Simply work with any content and update your app or site instantly. You are in control, no need to involve developers for content updates.

-Multiple languages: Localize your content to reach your global audiences.

-Media & files: Upload any media: images, videos, audio and more.

-Live collaboration: Work with your team and see changes instantly.

-Cloud-based: Ready to use: No installation, no downloads, no setup.
